items.label: 539fb93eec4f024bc1dc2069
items.description:
This C.A.R.E.S. pricing plan is available to those residential customers presently taking service under the Company's residential service pricing plan whose gross annual income is not more than one hundred fifty percent (150%) of the federal poverty level guideline effective at the time qualification and annual certification is sought.

Customer Charge = Meter Services + Meter Reading + Billing & Collection + Customer Delivery
       
Energy Charge (1st 400 kWh) = Transmission + Sub-transmission + Delivery + Production
       
Energy Charge (All Additional kWh) = Transmission + Sub-transmission + Delivery + Production
items.energycomments: CARES LOW INCOME MEDICAL LIFE SUPPORT PROGRAM DISCOUNT applies to the rate.
items.name: C.A.R.E.S - M
